mapper.sql: id, comp_id, problem_id, score, ac_count, submit_count, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into competition_problem (id, comp_id, problem_id, score, ac_count, submit_count, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{problemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{acCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{submitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update competition_problem
comp_id = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
problem_id = #{problemId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ac_count = #{acCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
submit_count = #{submitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update competition_problem set comp_id = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, problem_id = #{problemId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ac_count = #{acCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, submit_count = #{submitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select cp.id, cp.comp_id, cp.score,cp.submit_count,cp.ac_count, cp.problem_id, cp.create_time, cp.update_time, p.name problem_name from competition_problem cp join problem p on p.id = cp.problem_id where cp.comp_id = #{competitionId}
